programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: When soft spoken and timid Temisan’s world turns upside down and her former loving husband starts to abuse her physically and verbally. She starts to find a seething rage building up inside her.

programme.title: Blood & Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: Six Feet Too Far
programme.desc: A model falls in love and marries her manager with the promise that they will have a child when her career takes off. Things start looking good for her but he is still hesitant to take the next step, and she goes on a mission to find out why.

programme.title: Mismatched
programme.desc: A drunken mistake derails Nattan's plans for the perfect life, leading to romantic advances from an unexpected source, a meddling mother and a vengeful ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Shaffy's Sister
programme.desc: Shaffy’s sister, Daisy struggles to interact with her family and find her place in the society after spending years in prison.

programme.title: Something Strange
programme.desc: Dami and Shalewa’s lives are turned upside down when birthday celebrations turn into a nightmare and Shalewa is assaulted. Dami is pointed as the obvious culprit due to his constant pursuit of Shalewa but are there other people being overlooked?

programme.title: The Hangout Season 4 Ep 2
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A rich couple's plan to have their first child abroad hit a snag when the man loses his main source of income but refuses to let his wife know. He decides to do several jobs to make up the money but ends up neglecting his wife. Things take a turn when she finds out about the deceit by accident.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Forever Is A Lie
programme.desc: Jason and Ivy are a young couple and partners in love and in crime as they get money from commiting fraudulent activities against unsuspecting victims, however things start to go wrong when jealousy seeps in and one of them takes things too far. Starring Jessica Tse, Chuddy Davidson, Dante Okere

programme.title: The Hangout Season 4 Ep 3
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: For Better For Trouble
programme.desc: Tensions rise in the household of a newly married couple when the husband brings home an uncouth maid.

programme.title: Blood & Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: The Hit list
programme.desc: A well-known lothario, who keeps a journal of his ‘Hit List’, finds his head turned when his neighbour, the next person on his list, is more than he expected.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 9
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 10

Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. programme.title: Beauty Of A Wife Material
programme.desc: A story of a couple, desperate to have children, decide to go down the route of surrogacy which almost destroys their marriage.
